name: comparison_income
parameter: Estimated annual income of potential recipient of money spent on an innovation's operating costs
source: Given that 83% of the reach of DIV supported innovations are in India, we are using India's GDP per capita in 2010 to proxy for the estimated annual income of a potential recipient of money spent on an innovation's operating costs. (this amount is the "c" referred to in the example in the Methodology section, used to calculate the loss in consumption due to operating costs in OP units)

name: daly_op
parameter: OP valuation of 1 DALY (in log points)
